outputs.output_descr: Successful, cost-effective, and replicable approaches towards effective management of Strict Nature Reserves and support their further expansion developed and demonstrated. The project will attain its output through the realization of three major activities: 1. Master Plan for Protected Area System of Uzbekistan is guiding the expansion; 2. Strengthened institutional and individual capacity to enable expansion and improved management effectiveness; 3.Demonstration of new conservation management approaches (new governance approaches) in buffer areas of strict nature reserves in Uzbekistan.

project_descr: Strengthening Sustainability of the National Protected Area System by Focusing on Strictly Protected Areas
